Question.Subject: Is this scam??????????????????????????????????????????????????
Question.Content: I won and paid dis Item on Ebay. However, I still dunno Where mah item is! Was it scam????????????????????????????????????????
Question.ChosenAnswer: If less then a week has past be patient. Ideally the buyer should have given you a tracking number and notified that he shipped the item to you. If neither of those have happened and a week or more has passed email the seller and ask him where the item is. If he doesn't respond back file a claim on Paypal or Ebay.

Answer.Content: If less then a week has past be patient. Ideally the buyer should have given you a tracking number and notified that he shipped the item to you. If neither of those have happened and a week or more has passed email the seller and ask him where the item is. If he doesn't respond back file a claim on Paypal or Ebay.
